title: Trailblazer League/Areas/Morytania

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Morytania Area covers the entirety of Morytania along with the island of Mos Le'Harmless, Braindeath Island, Dragontooth Island, and Harmony Island. Underground areas and instanced areas with an entrance in the area are also included.

content:
The Morytania Area covers the entirety of Morytania along with the island of Mos Le'Harmless, Braindeath Island, Dragontooth Island, and Harmony Island. Underground areas and instanced areas with an entrance in the area are also included.

Contents

  • 1 Overview of area
    • 1.1 Notable settlements
    • 1.2 Restricted travel
    • 1.3 Notable combat-related activities
    • 1.4 Notable non-combat activities
    • 1.5 Notable shops
    • 1.6 Slayer tasks added
  • 2 Unlocks
    • 2.1 Quests
    • 2.2 Achievement diary tasks
  • 3 Notable drops

Overview of area[edit | edit source]

Notable settlements[edit | edit source]

  • Burgh de Rott
  • Canifis
  • Darkmeyer
  • Meiyerditch
  • Mort'ton
  • Mos Le'Harmless
  • Port Phasmatys
  • Slepe
  • Ver Sinhaza

Restricted travel[edit | edit source]

The following travel options are restricted unless the appropriate area is unlocked:

  • The agility shortcut through the railing next to the Paterdomus Temple leading to Misthalin
  • The stairs leading from the Paterdomus temple up to Misthalin

Notable combat-related activities[edit | edit source]

  • Barrows
  • Cave horrors
  • Fenkenstrain's experiments
  • Grotesque guardians
  • Haunted Mine
  • The Nightmare of Ashihama
  • Lair of Tarn Razorlor
  • Shades of Mort'ton
  • Slayer Tower
  • Theatre of Blood
  • Vyrewatch Sentinels

Notable non-combat activities[edit | edit source]

  • Canifis Rooftop Course
  • Daeyalt Essence mining
  • Ectofuntus prayer training
  • Hallowed Sepulchre
  • Harmony Island herb patch
  • Port Phasmatys allotment patch
  • Temple Trekking
  • Vyrelord pickpocketing
  • Werewolf Agility Course

Notable shops[edit | edit source]

  • Ak-Haranu's Exotic Shop.
  • Smithing Smith's Shop.

Slayer tasks added[edit | edit source]

Unlocking Morytania will add the following tasks to your slayer list:

  • Banshees
  • Bloodveld
  • Cave horrors
  • Gargoyles
  • Nechryaels
  • Vampyres

Unlocks[edit | edit source]

The following quests and achievement diary tasks are automatically completed after unlocking the area.

Quests[edit | edit source]

  • Darkness of Hallowvale
    • In Aid of the Myreque
      • In Search of the Myreque
  • The Great Brain Robbery
    • Creature of Fenkenstrain
    • Cabin Fever
      • Pirate's Treasure
      • Rum Deal
        • Zogre Flesh Eaters
          • Big Chompy Bird Hunting
  • Recipe for Disaster/Freeing Pirate Pete
    • Recipe for Disaster/Another Cook's Quest
      • Cook's Assistant

Achievement diary tasks[edit | edit source]

Automatically completed diary tasks upon area unlock
Morytania Diary
Easy Tasks

None

Medium Tasks
  • Make a batch of cannonballs at the Port Phasmatys furnace
Hard Tasks
  • Enter the Kharyrll portal in your PH through a Portal Chamber
  • Pray at the altar of nature in the nature grotto with piety activated
Elite Tasks
  • Catch a shark in Burgh de Rott with your bare hands
  • Fertilize the Morytania herb patch using lunar spells

Notable drops[edit | edit source]

These items are highlighted as key drops from the area which are affected by the boosted drop rate granted by passive relics at tier 3 and tier 5.

Group content such as The Nightmare and Theatre of Blood will determine the drop rate modifier for their uniques from the MVP of that particular kill or completion.

Item Source Base
Rarity		 Relic Tier 4
Rarity		 Relic Tier 6

rawContent:
The '''Morytania Area''' covers the entirety of [[Morytania]] along with the island of [[Mos Le'Harmless]], [[Braindeath Island]], [[Dragontooth Island]], and [[Harmony Island]]. Underground areas and [[instance|instanced areas]] with an entrance in the area are also included.

==Overview of area==
===Notable settlements===
* [[Burgh de Rott]]
* [[Canifis]]
* [[Darkmeyer]]
* [[Meiyerditch]]
* [[Mort'ton]]
* [[Mos Le'Harmless]]
* [[Port Phasmatys]]
* [[Slepe]]
* [[Ver Sinhaza]]

===Restricted travel===
The following travel options are restricted unless the appropriate area is unlocked:
* The agility shortcut through the railing next to the [[Paterdomus Temple]] leading to [[Misthalin]]
* The stairs leading from the Paterdomus temple up to Misthalin

===Notable combat-related activities===
* [[Barrows]]
* [[Cave horrors]]
* [[Experiment|Fenkenstrain's experiments]]
* [[Grotesque guardians]]
* [[Haunted Mine]]
* [[The Nightmare of Ashihama]]
* [[Lair of Tarn Razorlor]]
* [[Shades of Mort'ton]]
* [[Slayer Tower]]
* [[Theatre of Blood]]
* [[Vyrewatch Sentinels]]

===Notable non-combat activities===
* [[Canifis Rooftop Course]]
* [[Daeyalt Essence]] mining
* [[Ectofuntus]] prayer training
* [[Hallowed Sepulchre]]
* [[Harmony Island]] herb patch
* [[Port Phasmatys]] allotment patch
* [[Temple Trekking]]
* [[Vyrelord]] pickpocketing
* [[Werewolf Agility Course]]

===Notable shops===

* [[Ak-Haranu's Exotic Shop.]]
* [[Smithing Smith's Shop.]]

===Slayer tasks added===
Unlocking Morytania will add the following tasks to your slayer list:
* [[Banshees]]
* [[Bloodveld]]
* [[Cave horrors]]
* [[Gargoyles]]
* [[Nechryaels]]
* [[Vampyres]]

==Unlocks==
The following quests and achievement diary tasks are automatically completed after unlocking the area.
===Quests===
*[[Darkness of Hallowvale]]
**[[In Aid of the Myreque]]
***[[In Search of the Myreque]]
*[[The Great Brain Robbery]]
**[[Creature of Fenkenstrain]]
**[[Cabin Fever]]
***[[Pirate's Treasure]]
***[[Rum Deal]]
****[[Zogre Flesh Eaters]]
*****[[Big Chompy Bird Hunting]]
*[[Recipe for Disaster/Freeing Pirate Pete]]
**[[Recipe for Disaster/Another Cook's Quest]]
***[[Cook's Assistant]]

===Achievement diary tasks===

==Notable drops==
These items are highlighted as key drops from the area which are affected by the boosted drop rate granted by passive relics at tier 3 and tier 5. 

Group content such as [[The Nightmare]] and [[Theatre of Blood]] will determine the drop rate modifier for their uniques from the MVP of that particular kill or completion.
